summary: Restructure an existing HTML page into a clean semantic layout using header, main, and footer containers while keeping all content unchanged.
architectural_notes: Maintain all existing content unchanged while reorganizing markup into semantic containers (header, main, footer).

existing_features.title: Refactor the existing page markup to use a fully semantic layout by placing the current content into appropriate HTML5 semantic containers (at minimum: <header>, <main>, and <footer>), while keeping all existing content completely unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate fully restructured HTML using semantic containers (header/main/footer) with no content changes

projectName: Restructure existing page markup into semantic HTML containers without changing content
